text: Cng klaw theid (muhammad) chan mi phb wa nı sing thi thuk hı pen xongkar kæ channan mi sing txng ham kæ phu briphokh thi ca briphokh man nxkcak sing nan pen satw thi tay xeng hrux leuxd thi hil xxk hrux neux sukr thæcring man pen sing somm hrux pen sing lameid sung thuk pelng nam xun ca kxallxhˌ thi man tha phu dı di rab khwam khabkhan doy michı pen phu sæwngha læa michı phu lameid læw sir thæcring phracea khxng cea nan pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ pen phuthrng xendu metta
